desc.p: Specifies whether the report needs to be printed online or during COB.

p.p: If it is online, PRITING.DATE must be todays date.

p.span: Specifies the type of print to choose for printing.

p.p: Final - updates the field SCHEDULE, PRITING.DATE, PRITING.TYPE, and LAST.RPTD.PRD NEXT.PRD.START to next printing cycle in WR.KYR.INFO

desc.p: Specifies the end date for the list of transactions that are printed in the statement.
Specifies the frequency to generate next transaction period.
Specifies the start date for the list of transactions that are printed in the statement.
Defines the printing date for reports attached to the portfolios or groups that are linked to the report book.

p.p: If the field ONLINE.OR.COB is ‘ONLINE’ the PRITING.DATE allows only TODAY’s date.
If the field PRINTING.DATE is null and ONLINE.OR.COB is ‘ONLINE’, while commiting, the value TODAY’s date is defaulted to the PRINTING.DATE field.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
